On 3/24/2018 at 9:33 AM, Jim123 said:

why do we make such a big deal over licences mods are free i understand if someone took a copy of squad and sold it for free but ksp costs money and mods do not. i dont mean to be rude or offend anyone i love both of these mods there both good but i just dont understand why we make a big deal over something that is free

im sorry if i sound rude i dont mean to be i just dont have a good understanding of licences and theirs probably a good reason that i dont know that means it bad but please let ufindbatma still have this mod i need this mod i just simply cant go without it atleast let ufindbatma make his own textures for it so that way we can still have it i think hes talted enough to do it (no offense meant) i also no idea why my leaders turned bold black and ignore my bad grammer

Licenses are important as without a license, anyone could take the mod and claim it as their own. Imagine you spent weeks on a mod, and then some rude greedy person took it and claimed it as their own. Some more worse things could happen like people selling the mod, which means the copier gets all the money but not the dev.

 

Its like sponge bob. Mr krabs spent ages making the krabby patty formula. And then plankton steals it and claims it as his own. Mr krabs would be liquided off, and so do mod developers. When their mod is stolen, redistributed or sold without their permission, they have the right to take it down. Without a license, they can't as nothing is stopping the copier, as there were no rules on copying it.
Doe Gemfx work for 1.2.2 if not I'll try K3SP

1 hour ago, KspLover777 said:

Doe Gemfx work for 1.2.2 if not I'll try K3SP

Yep, it should work, however k3sp is the bees knees as well..
I am not sure if this has been asked yet but is there a roadmap or something similar for 1.3.x or 1.4.x, if you have any updates planned at all?

I would like to point out to everyone that these will not work with RSS 1.3.1. Changes were made to the biomes and textures and the old rss textures had to be redone for that release. Also the -7 version of kopernicus requires the updated files to work correctly. This will need to be updated to work properly please don't post about it in the RSS thread if you decide to use these and your game is broken/won't load.

Edited April 3, 2018 by raidernick

13 hours ago, Pointblank66 said:

I am not sure if this has been asked yet but is there a roadmap or something similar for 1.3.x or 1.4.x, if you have any updates planned at all?

If you want ETO for the stock system, and for 1.4x, I have developed a mod similar to ETO but for the stock system. It's called KETO.
Hi ! Can you tell me how i can have the same color of Venus as on RSSVE ?

Hello @ufindbatman,

Unfortunately, we've had to remove your download links due to non-compliance with the add-on posting rules, specifically:

On 1/11/2017 at 10:20 AM, Frybert said:

1. Licenses

  • All add-ons, dependencies and packs that are posted on the services maintained by Squad that serve the KSP Community (such as this forum and Curse) must be accompanied by a license for each add-on contained therein, that regulates what other users can do with the copyrighted material.
  • These licenses must be made available in both the download file as a readme or license text, and in the location the user downloads from (such as a forum post or a Curse listing).
  • Packs of add-ons cannot be licensed as a whole and no ownership of a pack of add-ons is permitted.

Please explicitly state the license of your mod.  It appears that your mod includes other people's content, so please explicitly state the licenses of that content.  This license information needs to be stated in the OP of this thread.

Also, please ensure that what you're doing with other people's content is, in fact, compatible with their licenses-- otherwise you can't use it.

Please ensure that you've taken care of all the above issues before you restore any download links.  Thank you for your understanding.
